entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Rally Liquidates Over $1 Billion in Trades Overnight
entry.summary: As Bitcoin eyes a possible breakout above $21,000, the broader crypto market’s liquidations over the past day topped a massive $1 billion.

entry.title: Singapore Mulls Ban on Letting Retail Investors Buy Crypto With Leverage
entry.summary: Besides potentially banning leveraged trading, Singapore regulators may also implement a knowledge test before letting users deal in crypto.

entry.title: Crypto Bank SEBA Launches Institutional Custody Service for Ethereum NFTs
entry.summary: After launching its custody service, Institutional investors will now be able to hold their CryptoPunks and Bored Apes NFTs with SEBA.

entry.title: Former Bithumb Chairman May Face Eight Years in Prison for Alleged $70M Fraud
entry.summary: Prosecutors are reportedly seeking an eight-year jail sentence for Lee Jung-hoon, the former chairman of the Bithumb crypto exchange.

entry.title: Dogecoin Joins Ethereum in Double-Digit Gains as Crypto Rallies
entry.summary: Dogecoin has jumped 10% over the past 24 hours alongside Ethereum. Shiba Inu has also enjoyed a hefty rally.

entry.title: Circle Bullish on EU Growth, Regulators Turn Attention to Developing DeFi Rules
entry.summary: The company behind USDC, the world’s second-largest stablecoin, sees a clear path forward.

entry.title: Will Binance Still Back Elon Musk’s Twitter Takeover? ‘I Think So,’ CEO Says
entry.summary: The $500 million commitment is contingent on the Tesla founder remaining on board.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hits $20K, Ethereum Rises 12% as Crypto Market Cap Tops $1 Trillion
entry.summary: Ethereum reaches levels unseen since soon after the merge as the wider crypto market takes a break from the doldrums.

entry.title: Cash App Users Can Now Send and Receive Bitcoin via Lightning
entry.summary: The previous Lightning function on the popular payments app was limited but now users can send and receive Bitcoin via the speedy solution.

entry.title: BitMEX Names Stephan Lutz Interim CEO As Hoeptner Steps Down
entry.summary: The crypto derivatives exchange told Decrypt that Hoeptner has left the company "with immediate effect."

entry.title: Elizabeth Warren, Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez Target Crypto’s Revolving Door
entry.summary: The lawmakers are concerned about crypto’s “rapidly escalated” lobbying and its potential to “corrupt the policymaking process.”

entry.title: Terra Witness Skips Official Inquiry, Cites 'Extreme Stress' and 'Panic Disorder'
entry.summary: Several witnesses have been absent from recent parliamentary inquiries as South Korean authorities continue to probe the Terra collapse.

entry.title: Bitfinex Beat Binance, Coinbase for Bitcoin-Pound Trading Volume Last Month
entry.summary: Of all crypto exchanges, including Coinbase and Binance, Bitfinex benefitted the most from the currency chaos in the UK last month.

entry.title: Compound Unanimously Votes to Pause Activity for 4 Cryptocurrencies
entry.summary: Users won't be able to temporarily use 0x (ZRX), Basic Attention Token (BAT), Maker (MKR), and Yearn Finance (YFI) on Compound now.

entry.title: Ark Invest Scoops Up More Coinbase, Block, and Robinhood Stock
entry.summary: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest made its first purchase of Coinbase stock since June this year, along with more Block and Robinhood shares.

entry.title: Australian Regulator Cracks Down on Crypto Firm for ‘False, Misleading’ Claims
entry.summary: The company behind the Qoin cryptocurrency has been accused of misrepresenting customers’ ability to cash out of the tokens.

entry.title: SEC Chair Gensler Says Crypto Is Centralized Despite Founding Principles
entry.summary: Crypto may have been "founded on the idea of decentralization," says Gensler, but that hasn't stopped centralization from emerging in the market.

entry.title: Chinese Intelligence Allegedly Tried to Bribe U.S. Official With Bitcoin
entry.summary: The spies, who appear to have used Wasabi Wallet, were hoping to meddle in the U.S. case against Huawei.

entry.title: MakerDAO Votes to Custody $1.6 Billion in USDC With Coinbase
entry.summary: The MakerDAO pilot will run through the end of 2022 before the community needs to vote on whether to keep its USDC with Coinbase next year.

entry.title: Apple Restricts Using NFTs to Unlock Content, Features in Apps
entry.summary: Apple also affirms its longstanding policy preventing links to alternate payment methods.

entry.title: Near Project to Wind Down Its Terra-Like Stablecoin
entry.summary: To avoid another LUNA debacle, the undercollateralized USN will be phased out.

entry.title: Reddit NFTs Surge as Polygon-Based Avatars Reach Millions of New Users
entry.summary: Trading volume for Reddit’s Collectible Avatars is up 799% so far today as traders celebrate the project’s widespread adoption.

entry.title: Vertu’s Luxury Web3 Phone Tops Out at $41,000
entry.summary: The Metavertu is a Web3-focused device that runs its own node and turns photos and videos into NFTs with one click.

entry.title: Polygon's QuickSwap Hit With $220,000 Flash Loan Attack
entry.summary: The popular DEX said Monday that it had closed its lending protocol QuickSwap Lend.

entry.title: Aave Launches Staked Ethereum Earn Strategy Through Oasis
entry.summary: Oasis will allow users with ETH to enter into a recursive stETH/ETH strategy in a single transaction by using the Aave protocol.

entry.title: Robinhood Adds Aave and Tezos
entry.summary: The popular trading app has added two new cryptocurrencies to its lineup of assets: proof-of-stake blockchain Tezos and lending protocol Aave.

entry.title: UK Conservatives Elect Crypto Bull Rishi Sunak as Next Prime Minister
entry.summary: The former Finance Minister is a supporter of both private-sector crypto innovation and CBDCs.

entry.title: Binance 'Narrowing Down' Identity of $570M Smart Chain Bridge Attacker
entry.summary: Binance is working with law enforcement to find an attacker who stole $570M worth of funds from the Binance Smart Chain.

entry.title: Bitcoin Eyes Safe-Haven Status as Gold Correlation Returns, Says Bank of America
entry.summary: Despite Bitcoin’s volatility amid a wider economic rout, the leading cryptocurrency and gold appear to be behaving quite similarly.

entry.title: Fireblocks Adds Worldpay as Network Partner for New Crypto Payments Engine
entry.summary: Fireblock’s Payments Engine aims to provide a turnkey solution for businesses looking to integrate cryptocurrencies into their products.

entry.title: Freeway Token Plunges as ‘High Yield’ Crypto Project Halts Withdrawals
entry.summary: Freeway, which boasted 40% returns, has halted its services, citing “volatility" in the forex and cryptocurrency markets.

entry.title: Axie Infinity Drops 22% Over The Week Amid Fears of Token Unlock
entry.summary: The popular crypto game Axie Infinity is expected to distribute nearly 21.543 million tokens for early investors and advisors today.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried to Refund FTX Phishing Victims With $6 Million
entry.summary: The FTX chief stressed that the measures were not to be taken as a precedent and that this was just “a one-time thing.”

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Jumps 3% to Hit New All-Time High
entry.summary: Bitcoin's mining difficulty and hash rate continue to hit new highs despite the asset's struggles around the $19,000 mark.

entry.title: Indictment Against Former OpenSea Employee Moves Forward
entry.summary: A judge has denied the defendant’s motion to dismiss wire fraud and money laundering charges.

entry.title: Pigeon, Eagle, Phoenix: How Maker Will Use US Treasuries to Buy Ethereum and Boost DAI
entry.summary: Maker has taken criticism for its "decentralized" stablecoin DAI's exposure to centralized stablecoin USDC. Its Endgame plan aims to address that.

entry.title: SBF Addresses Backlash, Revises His Crypto Standards Proposal
entry.summary: One critic said the regulatory model suggested by FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried ‘absolutely sucks.’

entry.title: Dogecoin Layer 2 Dogechain Up 228% for the Week
entry.summary: After steady declines over two months, DC spikes over 300% since Friday.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Ripple Wrenches SEC Documents Loose, Mango Markets Hacker Tweets Trading Tips
entry.summary: Plus, one man glued himself to a bench in New York to protest the “lack of up only” in cryptocurrency.

entry.title: Azuki 'Proof of Skate' Auction Draws $2.5 Million for NFT-Backed Skateboards
entry.summary: "Fierce bidding" erupted over eight gold-plated skateboards offered by Chiru Labs.

entry.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces
entry.summary: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a metaverse."

entry.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes
entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap
entry.summary: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.

entry.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.

entry.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko
entry.summary: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 3: Where Is Do Kwon?
entry.summary: In this episode of Decrypt-Os, Sander Lutz is back on the street to search for Terra co-founder Do Kwon after Interpol issued a "red notice." His search takes him to the home of a former CIA agent for guidance, and to the place where everyone missing goes to hide out: the mall.

entry.title: The DeFi Governance Conundrum: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick spoke with Decrypt's Dan Roberts all about DeFi governance and its challenges, his problems with voting platforms like Snapshot, DAO fatigue, regulation and the SEC, and stablecoins onstage at Chainlink SmartCon 2022.

entry.title: How Web3 Data Storage Startup Space and Time Scored Microsoft Investment
entry.summary: Space and Time CEO Nate Holiday joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Space and Time's data storage business, how it got investment from Microsoft, and why crypto-native businesses are looking for alternatives to big centralized cloud providers.

entry.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: 3 Paths for DeFi Investment Right Now
entry.summary: Framework Ventures co-founder Vance Spencer joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the three paths for DeFi, why crypto VCs are all talking about NFTs and gaming right now, and whether crypto startups should be concerned about regulation.

entry.title: Compound Founder: Stablecoins Have 'Crazy Traction' and Do What Bitcoin Was Expected to Do
entry.summary: Compound founder Robert Leshner joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the shift Compound has seen in borrowing demands and how it has adjusted accordingly, why he believes stablecoins "will win and conquer everything," and how regulators are approaching the space.

entry.title: Coin Metrics CEO: TradFi Firms Getting Into Crypto Care Most About Mitigating Their Risk
entry.summary: Coin Metrics CEO Tim Rice joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the blockchain data Coin Metrics gathers, who its customers are, how studying blockchain data can cut down on risk and exposure, and the priorities and concerns of traditional firms that are dipping a toe into crypto.

entry.title: Why Superchief Gallery 'Leaned In Really Hard Really Early' to Displaying NFTs
entry.summary: Superchief Gallery co-founder Ed Zipco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Superchief's IRL NFT gallery in L.A., how the gallery updated its tech in 2016 to thin displays to show digital art, and why Zipco believes Superchief "shows digital work the way you'd want to live with it or see it in a museum—not on a phone, not on a laptop."

entry.title: How Armanino Performs Proof of Reserves: Clayton Lowery at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Clayton Lowery of Armanino LLP joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Armanino conducts its "proof of reserves" audits of crypto lenders like Nexo, how to foresee the next crypto company meltdown, trust in Tether, and scrutiny of stablecoins.

entry.title: OKX's Chengcai Li: 'Theres a Lot of Work to Do' Because Much of Web3 Is Still Powered by Web2
entry.summary: Chengcai Li, head of business development at OKX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about OKCoin's rebrand to OKX, dealing with different regulations in different countries, and how centralized exchanges can lead Web3 into its next era.

entry.title: Crypto Policy Crystal Ball: Coinbase, Haun Ventures, and Crypto Council for Innovation at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Regulation and policy is going to be the factor that most meaningfully shapes the crypto industry in the next few years. On a panel at Messari Mainnet 2022, Coinbase US policy chief Kara Calvert, Haun Ventures chief policy officer Tomicah Tillemann, and Crypto Council for Innovation CEO Sheila Warren gazed into the policy crystal ball with Decrypt's Dan Roberts.

entry.title: Why NEAR Founder Illia Polosukhin Is Bullish on Sweatcoin and Other Social Dapps
entry.summary: Near Protocol founder Illia Polosukhin joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about what's being built on Near's blockchain, real-life use cases for DeFi including Sweatcoin, and how crypto continues to help Ukraine, where Polosukhin is from.

entry.title: How DeFi Chain Is 'Bringing DeFi Back to Bitcoin': DeFi Chain Accelerator Founder
entry.summary: Santiago Sabater, founder of DeFi Chain Accelerator, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about how DeFi Chain supports smart contracts on a proof-of-stake fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.

entry.title: How Gitcoin Has Given Millions of Dollars in Crypto to Worthy Projects: Azeem Khan at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Gitcoin's fundraising and partnerships lead Azeem Khan tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Gitcoin grants work, the importance of community voting, and continuing to give out grants even through the bear market.

entry.title: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick: Regulation Will Fork DeFi Projects Into Two Camps
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to give his views on regulation and the SEC, how DeFi projects will split between compliant and non-compliant and that it's "ideologically confusing" but "not necessarily a bad thing."

entry.title: Bringing Institutions to Crypto: Christine Moy of Apollo, David Mercer of LMAX at SALT NY
entry.summary: Christine Moy of Apollo Global, formerly of JPMorgan, and David Mercer of LMAX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at SALT NY for a talk on institutional crypto investing and what hurdles remain to broader adoption amid the crypto bear market.
